Articles.Content:
You're falling towards an alien planet with hostile plants and animals. Explore, survive, and fight. Build space ships and equipment. The catch? It's going to be complicated.

www.iotapersei.com

It's inspired a bit by KSP and also Minecraft. You fly around and explore just a few planets, but the detail is really in the planets, not in the space ship. There are animals and plants. There are spaceships, and some story parts, but not easy to find at the moment.

It's still in very early release, so lots of things are planned that aren't there yet.

Enjoy, and let me know how you get on.

Hugo
Looks promising! Will definitely try it out.
